name: Journey for the Records of Remembrance
name_original: Journey for the Records of Remembrance
description:
From the dawn of time humankind has asked ourselves…What will we remember? What will be forgotten? And most of all, do Earth’s copyright Laws apply in space?!

Recruit your fellow space probes throughout the solar system as you journey together through Deep Space looking for the Records of Remembrance!

_______

Update 1.1- Added volume slider to opening menu, and added hints to death screen.

_______

If you get stuck trying to get to one of the probes, try coming back to it later, when you have better equipment.

Every probe can be ping'd from at least 1 other planet, but you might need some upgrades first.

_______

Unfortunately it will not run in the browser for Firefox.

There is a volume slider in the pause menu once you hit new game.
